title: Marsha Ambrosius Interview and More
itunes:title: Marsha Ambrosius Interview and More
description:
Thursday 5/4- Today on the show R and B singer Marsha Ambrosius joined us and gave us details on how their wasn't a good flow in "Floetry" after all. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of Day to Swanson funeral home after they put the wrong body in a casket. Moreover, Angela also gave some listeners advice during Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
